data.text: @twixbchnmouse I, like you, hope it never comes, barring the professions that will require it.

@KantBreal The first person that is asked to prove they've taken "the shot" means that it was mandatory, without using the words.
I'm waiting for that.

@KantBreal Old body, young brain.
It's a curse...
@twixbchnmouse I would also never support any sort of mandatory vaccinations, unless you were going to be going to Public Schools, then it is up to those districts to make those sort of decisions.
@twixbchnmouse I assumed you to be younger.

@twixbchnmouse By the time it gets to be your turn to be able to get the vaccination it will have been thoroughly tested by tens of millions. 

Chances are I would survive this years variation of Influenza, but getting the vaccine will hopefully keep me & my wife from missing work.

the disease it's supposed to protect us from are 99%+.
Maybe next year, if the virus is still around, and the "cure" hasn't been found to be worse than the disease.
